main event: Several objects the size of G.I. footballs were observed moving rapidly at a low altitude in Los Angeles on 14 August 1957.
interesting points: The sighting lasted for approximately 15 seconds., The objects appeared to have brilliant illumination., Objects were seen through binoculars., The sighting is classified as significant due to speed and duration., Witness observations indicated the objects were not normal aircraft, as they disappeared into the clouds at high speed.
sighted object: 3 to 6 objects similar to G.I. footballs
witness description: Civilians and a jet pilot observed the objects visually.
